name: Undead: The First
description:
Run for your life! But wait...you're already dead!

You open your eyes and you don't know where you are. You feel bigger, stronger, more dead...you are a zombie! You are in a strange laboratory and you must flee from there. There are enemies, those humans who want to kill you. No problem, you are stronger than them and if you eat their corpses you will recover. Also, with your attacks, some of them can become zombies allies. Enjoy this adventure and escape while killing humans!

This game was developed as a final project at the University of Granada. Its development is paused, so we regret the possible glitches and the only possibility of language (Spanish). Art and music were searched on the Internet, but all programming work was developed by us.

Authors:

  • @malafar94 / malafar94.itch.io : Programmer
  • @sdfDaniel / sdflogan.itch.io : Programmer
